game.name: Legendary
game.shortDescription: All creatures of ancient myth, legend and lore are real  they've just been sealed away for thousands of years inside Pandora's Box, waiting... When a thief named Deckard is hired to steal an ancient artifact, he unwittingly triggers a war between man and myth.
game.shortDescriptionEn: All creatures of ancient myth, legend and lore are real  they've just been sealed away for thousands of years inside Pandora's Box, waiting... When a thief named Deckard is hired to steal an ancient artifact, he unwittingly triggers a war between man and myth.

reviewHighlights.text: 오래된 게임임을 감안 하여 그래픽적인 문제는 제외 하겠다. 등장하는 몬스터의 수가 그리 많지 않다. 늑대인간 콩벌레 요정(?) 젖소(?!) 닭(?!?!) 문어(!???!) 고작 이정도 이다. 맵 구성과 매우 Suck한 움직임으로 인해 길을 못찾을때가 많다. 예를 들면...
